title: Save $300 on Apple's 1TB M4 Pro 14-inch MacBook Pro this weekend
description: A trio of retailers are fighting for your money, by offering the 1TB 14-inch MacBook Pro with an upgraded M4 Pro chip at $300 off the list price.Grab weekend savings on the 14-inch MacBook Pro - Image credit: AppleThe M4 Pro update to the 14-inch MacBook Pro has made it an extremely viable option for anyone who wants to work on the move. It's so attractive that three major online retailers have the same offer.Amazon is offering the upgraded M4 Pro 14-inch MacBook Pro, complete with its 14-core CPU and 20-core GPU, 14.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, 24GB of unified memory and 1TB of storage at $2,099. That's $300 or 13% off the list price of $2,399. Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: AppleInsider Staff
excerpt: A trio of retailers are fighting for your money, by offering the 1TB 14-inch MacBook Pro with an upgraded M4 Pro chip at $300 off the list price.
text: Grab weekend savings on the 14-inch MacBook Pro - Image credit: Apple A trio of retailers are fighting for your money, by offering the 1TB 14-inch MacBook Pro with an upgraded M4 Pro chip at $300 off the list price. The M4 Pro update to the 14-inch MacBook Pro has made it an extremely viable option for anyone who wants to work on the move. It's so attractive that three major online retailers have the same offer. Amazon is offering the upgraded M4 Pro 14-inch MacBook Pro, complete with its 14-core CPU and 20-core GPU, 14.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, 24GB of unified memory and 1TB of storage at $2,099. That's $300 or 13% off the list price of $2,399. The package also gets you all-day battery life, support for Apple Intelligence features, 1,600 nits of brightness, a 12MP camera, and Thunderbolt 5 connectivity. While you could go with Amazon, there's also the opportunity to pick up the same bundle from B&H Photo, priced the same at $2,099. Lastly, you could elect to buy the 14-inch MacBook Pro in this configuration from Best Buy, again at $2,099. Either way, you are going to end up with a great deal on a portable Mac for on-the-go productivity.
html:
Grab weekend savings on the 14-inch MacBook Pro - Image credit: Apple

A trio of retailers are fighting for your money, by offering the 1TB 14-inch MacBook Pro with an upgraded M4 Pro chip at $300 off the list price.

The M4 Pro update to the 14-inch MacBook Pro has made it an extremely viable option for anyone who wants to work on the move. It's so attractive that three major online retailers have the same offer.

Amazon is offering the upgraded M4 Pro 14-inch MacBook Pro, complete with its 14-core CPU and 20-core GPU, 14.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, 24GB of unified memory and 1TB of storage at $2,099. That's $300 or 13% off the list price of $2,399.

The package also gets you all-day battery life, support for Apple Intelligence features, 1,600 nits of brightness, a 12MP camera, and Thunderbolt 5 connectivity.

While you could go with Amazon, there's also the opportunity to pick up the same bundle from B&H Photo, priced the same at $2,099.

Lastly, you could elect to buy the 14-inch MacBook Pro in this configuration from Best Buy, again at $2,099.

Either way, you are going to end up with a great deal on a portable Mac for on-the-go productivity.
